Title: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to convey real property at the St. Lawrence psychiatric center to the city of Ogdensburg or a private buyer
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to convey real property at the St. Lawrence psychiatric center to the city of Ogdensburg or a private buyer.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of general services to convey real property at the St. Lawrence psychiatric center to the city of Ogdensburg
